summary: TURN SIGNALS MALFUNCTIONED.  THE A/C STOPPED WORKING DUE TO A FAULTY EVAPORATOR.  THE STABILIZER BAR BROKE ON RIGHT SIDE WHICH CAUSED DRIFT/PULL.  ENGINE COOLANT/ANTIFREEZE LEAKED.  THE BALL JOINT FOR THE RIGHT-FRONT TIRE GAVE OUT.  THE ALTERNATOR HAD TO BE FIXED AND REPLACED THE BATTERY. SPEEDOMETER SEEMED TO BE OFF BY 5 MPH.  THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS WOULD NOT WORK PROPERLY AND STOPPED IN THE MIDDLE OF A DOWN-POUR. THE DEVICE TO LOWER THE SPARE TIRE HAD TO BE REPLACED.    *TT
